name: 莎娜·史坦

last_movies.title: 黑袍纠察队 第四季

introduction: Director/Producer Shana Stein Executive Produced six seasons of the immensely successful POWER; two seasons of GHOST, two seasons of RAISING KANAN and one season of newest entry FORCE. She has directed some of the most seminal episodes across all four series, including the penultimate episode of POWER. Prior to POWER, Shana was Co-Executive Producer on CBS's UNFORGETTABLE, and prior to that CW's 90210, where she spent four seasons. She started her TV career as Co-Producer on the USA Network original series MONK, where she worked for seven seasons. In film, Shana produced HELL RIDE, Executive Produced by Quentin Tarantino, and Independent Spirt Award nominated film, RESTAURANT starring Adrien Brody and Lauryn Hill. Shana began her career producing music videos, and also served as Director of Development for Anonymous Content. She earned her BFA from NYU's Tisch School of the Arts and her MFA from The American Film Institute.
